text: Santiago Guerrero Gutiérrez (born 7 May 1949) is a Mexican politician from the Institutional Revolutionary Party. From 2000 to 2003 he served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Guerrero. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Guerrero Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Institutional Revolutionary Party politicians Category:21st- century Mexican politicians
title: Santiago Guerrero Gutiérrez
